entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow mixed with freezing rain. Temperature rising to zero by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of snow or freezing rain. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to zero by morning. Wind chill minus 7 this evening. Forecast issued 10:51 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Flurries or rain showers. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Flurries changing to a few rain showers or drizzle and a few flurries near noon. Risk of freezing rain early in the morning. High plus 2. Forecast issued 10:51 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow or rain. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: A few rain showers or drizzle and a few flurries changing to snow in the evening. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming north 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 10:51 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023
